text:
Dagfinn Bakke (16 August 1933 — 1 January 2019) was a Norwegian painter, illustrator and graphical artist. He was born in Lødingen, Norway. From 1952 he worked as illustrator for the magazine "Magasinet For Alle", and from 1956 to 1992 for the newspaper "Lofotposten". He was represented at the National Gallery of Norway.
Bakke died on 1 January 2019 in Oslo at the age of 85.
